titles.title: To eliminate the fees associated with Forest Service special use permits that authorize a church to use structures and improvements on National Forest System lands for religious or educational purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 5/6/1999--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Agriculture from imposing a special use permit fee on churches using structures or improvements on National Forest System lands for religious or educational purposes.
